allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript build errors for Vercel deployment

- Add .vercelignore to exclude media-editor-platform source files
- Add .npmrc with legacy-peer-deps and ignore-scripts
- Update tsconfig.json to explicitly exclude public folder
- Fix media-editor-platform TypeScript configuration \(strict: false\)
- Fix Supabase Database type with Relationships property
- Fix AuthProvider fetchDbUser return type

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
